Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Halifax in 1978...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/1979, off Elly Mae Clampett (PON)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Rightfield in 1979...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Coney Island on 4/14/1980...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Capital City on 8/19/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1981, hitting .385 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1981, hitting .337 with 5 HR, 26 RBI...
